overview:
Paul Nadeau brings more than 30 years of financial and business experience from positions in companies ranging in size from Fortune 50 to start-ups.

Prior to joining Act-On Software, Paul was at SignaCert, where he was CFO/VP Operations, Co-founder and early BOD member. SignaCert was recently acquired by Harris Corporation. Previous stops include Sequent, Digital Equipment Corporation, Computervision, and local early stage companies Tripwire, Learning.com, iMove, Inovise Medical, as well as others.
